tha-ap545:10.3: Sarena mahatā vīro → sussarena mahāvīro (bj) | sarena mahatā dhīro (s2, s3) | susarena mahāvīro (pts1)
tha-ap545:13.2: sattāhikampi vo → sattahikaṃ hi vo (bj) | sattāhakādhikaṃ (s2, s3) | sattāhikaṃ vibho (pts1)
tha-ap545:30.4: pāpatiṃ → papatiṃ (bj) | pāpiṭṭhaṃ (s2, s3) | pāpattaṃ (pts1, mr)
